comment.author: 21159359@N00
comment._content: I noticed the grave yard in the foreground so I wanted to research this building. It is a NYC Landmark at 71 Bdwy on corner of Rector St. that means the grave yard is from Trinity Church just barely seen on the right side of the photo. To read details to anyone interested: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Empire_Building_(Manhattan) copy whole link and put in browser to get to the right page
